item.title: CZ: Market Dips Again, Keep Building
item.description: On July 24th, CZ posted on Platform X and said, "The market is down again. Keep building."BlockBeats previously reported that on July 18th, Binance founder CZ posted on social media, "The cryptocurrency market is volatile." It is worth noting that this latest tweet is a retweet of the same content tweet that CZ posted on January 19th of this year, which stated, "Cryptocurrency is highly volatile (this volatility can be both a risk and an opportunity.)", with some minor differences.

item.title: Analysis: The European Central Bank is expected to keep interest rates unchanged tonight, and the market reaction is likely to be relatively muted
item.description: On July 24th, a strategist at TD Securities anticipates that the European Central Bank will maintain the deposit rate at 2.00% this evening. It is suggested that since this meeting may not indicate new policy actions, the market reaction might be relatively mild. The strategist holds the view that the ECB may need to both highlight the resilience of the Eurozone economy and mention the "extremely severe global uncertainty." The ECB is expected to continue its policy approach of being "data-dependent and making gradual meeting decisions." (FXStreet)

item.title: Huobi HTX will be listed on July 25th at 15:00 UTC with APEPE (Ape and Pepe), and will simultaneously add APEPE/USDT (10X) isolated margin trading.
item.description: On July 24th, according to an announcement from Huobi HTX, Huobi HTX will commence APEPE deposit services at 15:30 (GMT+8) on July 24th. APEPE/USDT spot trading will be opened at 15:00 (GMT+8) on July 25th. APEPE withdrawal services will be initiated at 15:00 (GMT+8) on July 26th. Meanwhile, at 15:00 (GMT+8) on July 25th, Huobi Futures will add APEPE/USDT (10X) isolated margin trading.

item.title: In the last 1 hour, the entire network has seen liquidations totaling $144 million, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On July 24th, based on Coinglass data, within the past 1 hour, the entire network has witnessed liquidations totaling $144 million. The long liquidations amount to $137 million, and the short liquidations amount to $6.9576 million.In the last 24 hours, a total of 314,844 people worldwide have been liquidated, with a total liquidation amount of $969 million. The largest single liquidation took place on Binance - BTCUSDC, amounting to $2.9614 million.

item.title: Pixel Vault is about to shut down, planning to sell the business and seeking acquisition offers
item.description: On July 24th, the NFT platform Pixel Vault is currently in the process of planning to sell the company and is seeking potential acquirers. The team is currently engaged in discussions with multiple institutions that are interested in acquiring Pixel Vault and its assets in order to continue serving the community. Additionally, they are also having direct communication with Seedphrase regarding the transition of the Wolf Game.Pixel Vault is also the publisher of PUNKS Comic and the MetaHero Universe. They stated, "After more than four years of development, we have initiated the process of winding down Pixel Vault. We have dedicated a lot of efforts to build a profitable and sustainable crypto entertainment company. Although our endeavors did not unfold as planned, we still wish to express our gratitude to the team, investors, and the community for their support."BlockBeats previously reported that on February 3, 2022, the NFT platform Pixel Vault announced the completion of a $100 m

item.title: Tether Assists U.S. Authorities in Freezing Terror-Related Funds and Reissuing Approximately $1.6 Million USDT
item.description: On July 24th, Tether announced that it had assisted the U.S. authorities in freezing and reissuing approximately 1.6 million USDT. These USDT were associated with the Gaza-based BuyCash company and were suspected of being involved in terrorist financing.This action forms part of a U.S. Department of Justice civil forfeiture case involving approximately $2 million in digital assets. Tether stated that it had frozen more than $2.9 billion in USDT, had collaborated with 275 law enforcement agencies covering 59 jurisdictions, and had pledged to continue supporting global law enforcement in combating illicit activities.

item.title: Coinbase Ventures will support the AI platform Bankr through the Base Ecosystem Fund
item.description: On July 24th, Coinbase Ventures declared in a blog that it is going to back the AI agent platform Bankr by means of the Base Ecosystem Fund. Bankr is one of the agent platforms integrated into Coinbase's freshly launched Base app. Transaction agents can respond more quickly than humans, operate around the clock, and are able to make more data-based decisions.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $118,000
item.description: On July 24th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin saw a rebound and exceeded $11,800. The 24-hour decline was narrowed to 0.39%.

item.title: After 2 billion PUMP tokens were withdrawn from Binance's hot wallet yesterday, they have now been deposited into Bybit.
item.description: On July 24th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the 2 billion PUMP tokens yesterday were suspected to have been transferred from Binance's hot wallet back to an address related to the project. This address has been labeled by Solscan as the "PUMP Top Fund 2", that is, a private investor.After receiving the refunded funds from Binance yesterday, these 2 billion tokens have been deposited into Bybit, resulting in a $6 million decrease in value compared to when they were deposited into Binance.

item.title: Publicly traded company Nativo Resources announces initiation of Bitcoin Treasury Reserve
item.description: July 24th, The company Nativo Resources listed in London (LON:NTVO) announced today that it has implemented a digital asset treasury policy. This enables the gold-focused mining company to allocate a part of its free cash flow and future financing proceeds to hold Bitcoin. The company is getting ready to resume its gold mining operations in the Tesoro (LON:0JYA) gold mine concession area in Peru. It stated that this policy will allow it to hold Bitcoin as a long-term financial reserve asset while fulfilling operational working capital requirements.According to a press release, Nativo has collaborated with Copper.co to offer institutional-grade custody services for its digital assets and anticipates receiving additional security services from Nemean Services. The company's board thinks that holding both gold and Bitcoin can offer shareholders a diversified hedge against inflation. It is noted that Bitcoin's fixed supply and decentralized nature complement the traditional store of valu
